games.title: Smash & Merge Balls
games.description:
Short Description: A skill-based arcade game with colorful physics.

Full Description: In this game, you control a character that starts a fusion chain reaction! 
Strike the colorful balls to get them moving. 
The key rule: when two balls of the same color collide, they merge, and you earn points. 
Create massive chains of mergers to maximize your high score!


(lore)
(from the Showman):
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Welcome to the greatest show in the cosmos ‚Äî the Arena of Fusion!

Here is your instrument of chaos ‚Äî the mighty merger mallet! Don't be shy, give it a swing! 
Your mission is brilliantly simple: step onto the arena floor and prepare for a rainbow deluge! 
Smash those colorful spheres, make them crash, and when two of the same color meet ‚Äî 
BOOM! ‚Äî they fuse into a glorious explosion of points!
games.howToPlayText:
-Use the "WASD" or the "touchscreen joystick" to move
-Use the "Space" or the "touch-screen button" to dash
-Use "left mouse button" or "Touch screen button" to Hit
-Hit the balls and collide the balls of the same color to score points, 
when they collide they create another ball of random color.

games.title: Merge number up
games.description:
Number Click Merge is a simple yet highly addictive number puzzle game that challenges your logic and observation skills.

Tap on groups of the same number to merge them into a higher number! The more blocks you merge in one move, the more points you earn. As numbers grow, the board becomes more strategic ‚Äî plan carefully to keep the combos going!
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on two or more connected tiles with the same number.

They merge into one tile with a higher number.

New tiles fall from the top to fill the gaps.

Keep merging to reach higher numbers and beat your high score!

games.title: 2048 3D: Merge Cubes
games.description:
Merge the Blocks, Reach 2048, and Conquer the Levels!**

Blocks with numbers from 2 to 2048 drop onto the field. Combine matching blocks to create higher-value ones and score points. But watch out ‚Äî some blocks are stones, which can‚Äôt be merged. Use powerful boosters like bombs and lightning to clear them out.
1. Make the most of your boosters:
2. X2 ‚Äî doubles the value of any number block
3. Bomb ‚Äî destroys surrounding blocks

Flash ‚Äî removes all stones from the field

Don‚Äôt let the blocks stack above the top boundary for more than three seconds ‚Äî or it‚Äôs game over!

Complete challenging levels, set high scores in endless mode, and become the ultimate merge master!
games.howToPlayText: Swipe left or right on an empty area of the screen (or drag with the left mouse button held down) to move the block into position. Release your finger (or let go of the mouse button) to drop the block.

games.howToPlayText: Press and hold your finger or mouse button within the playing area to select the monster's fall trajectory. Release your finger or mouse button and the monster will fall onto the playing field!  It will be easy to connect monsters at first, but with each new one the playing field will fill up. Drop identical monsters on top of each other. When the highest-ranking monster connects, it will disappear and you will get more points.

games.description: Play TetraDice ‚Äì Match & Build Blocks, a free puzzle game blending Tetris and dice mechanics! Strategically place dice-based shapes, clear lines, and challenge your logic. Enjoy Normal & Endless Modes, unique levels, and addictive gameplay. Start playing now!
games.howToPlayText:
- Your goal is to create combinations using the provided figures.
- You get points for successfully collected combinations and perform special tasks.
- The more matches - the more points.

games.title: Dice Puzzle
games.description: Dice Puzzle is a puzzle game where your task is to strategically place numbered cubes on the board, aiming to merge three adjacent cubes with the same number. As they combine, their value increases. Carefully select cubes with different points, considering their placement to match with others effectively. Be mindful, as cubes may appear individually or in pairs. Merge three or more dice horizontally or vertically to create higher-valued cubes. Utilize the storage space wisely to save cubes for later use. Test your puzzle-solving skills in this engaging dice-merging game!
games.howToPlayText:
Select a die (or a pair) from your tray and drag it onto the grid where it fits.
Tap the dice in the tray to rotate them before placing, especially helpful for pairs
When three or more dice of the same face touch, whether horizontally or vertically (even diagonally adjacently), they automatically merge into one higher-value die
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/dice-puzzle?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Merge 13
games.description: Merge 13 is a thrilling online puzzle game where players combine numbered cells for higher scores. Accessible on various devices without downloads, it provides a captivating mix of logic and math, perfect for puzzle enthusiasts. Jump right in and challenge your strategic thinking to reach 13!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag cells with the same value together to merge them into a higher-numbered cell. Keep combining until you achieve a greater value. The higher the number you reach, the more challenging the puzzle becomes. Watch out for how you position your cells and plan ahead for bigger merges.
Focus on merging cells strategically instead of randomly dragging them together. Sometimes it's better to save certain cells for future merges. Anticipation and planning will help you reach the highest values.

games.title: Funny Cubes 2048
games.description: Discover Funny Cubes 2048, an entertaining twist on the original 2048 game featuring playful physics. Strategically combine cubes to maximize their value, use boosters, and rack up achievements while competing globally. Enjoy free online play across devices and immerse yourself in the fun of merging cubes.
games.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game is to collect as large a cube as possible.
Throw a cube on the rest to collect the big ones in the genre of 2048.
I.e. if you throw a cube with a face value of 2 on a cube with a face value of 2, then 2 of them will get a cube of 4. I.e. the face value doubles. Nothing happens with cubes with different denominations, so they begin to accumulate and overflow the container, which complicates the game and can lead to a loss. There are also boosters that allow you to sort out a bunch of unassembled cubes, but you need to earn them by trying to collect several cubes at a time.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/funny-cubes-82c9-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Animal Merge
games.description:
Objective: Merge animal bubbles to create upgraded animals and ultimately achieve the final objective by collecting fully developed animals.
Gameplay Instructions:
Launching the Animal Bubbles:
Tap on an animal bubble to select it.
Drag the bubble backward to aim.
Release to launch the bubble in the opposite direction.
Merging Animal Bubbles:
When two identical animal bubbles collide, they merge to create an upgraded version.
Continue merging bubbles of the same type to progress.
Achieving the Objective:
Merge two basic-level animal bubbles to form an intermediate-level animal.
Merge intermediate-level animal bubbles to create the final full-fledged animal.
Once the final animal is created, it is automatically collected as part of the level objective.
Winning the Level:
The level is completed when you have successfully created and collected the required number of final animals.
games.howToPlayText:

games.title: Homo Evolution
games.description: Welcome to Homo Evolution, an enchanting journey where you can create your own little universe and unravel the mysteries of human evolution. This free online game lets you merge two individuals to birth a new, more modern life form, populating the planet with a wide array of creatures‚Äîfrom simple animals to diverse and unpredictable personalities. Whether you're on the phone or computer, this captivating gameplay invites you to shape the world in four unique ways, from the BEGINNING with animal evolution, to the BREAD civilization, witnessing the transformation from natural to modified products.
games.howToPlayText:
Create your own little world and drive on human evolution. Merge two people and get a new, more modern life form populating the planet with different creatures: from simple animals to diverse and unpredictable personalities.

There are 4 ways to shape the world as humanity emerges:

‚ñ™ BEGINNING
Animal evolution, from spores to modern individuals!
‚ñ™ FIRST PEOPLE
The path from the ancient world to the first citizens!
‚ñ™ SPECTACLE
A creative Bohemia, from poets to crazy party people!
‚ñ™ BREAD
Civilization with the degradation from natural to modified products!

There are also 8 stages of the world evolution:

‚ñ™ TELEVISION
‚ñ™ INTERNET
‚ñ™ SPORTS
‚ñ™ SCIENCE
‚ñ™ TELEUNITY
‚ñ™ VIRTUALIZATION
‚ñ™ TRANSFORMATION
‚ñ™ POWER CULT

Explore each branch to open the next. By tapping the last two life forms at this stage, you get access to a new, previously unknown world! Discover all the planets in this fun evolution game!

You start in the BEGINNING world with a small lizard. By combining two creatures, you create a new, more perfect being. You don‚Äôt need little alchemy or magic to evolve faster. Just click on the creatures to earn coins and buy more species to merge. Offline autoclicker included in this the game of life and planet evolution!

Start creating your own world right now!

games.title: Merge 2048
games.description:
Merge 2048 is a fun and addictive merging game where your goal is to combine matching numbered blocks to reach higher values‚Äîcan you unlock the elusive 2048 block?

Choose between two exciting modes:
 Classic 2048 and Shape Mode for a refreshing twist in gameplay.

As you drop blocks, plan your merges carefully to avoid filling up the container.
Feeling stuck? Use the powerful TNT Block to clear unwanted tiles and create space.

The game features clean visuals, smooth controls, and a satisfying progression that keeps you hooked.
Track your score, unlock cool titles, and see how far you can go without hitting the red line.
Perfect for quick sessions or long strategic runs‚ÄîMerge 2048 is simple to pick up, but hard to master!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Drag by clicking the left mouse button , and leave the button to drop the block.

Mobile:
Drag with touch screen and block is dropped when the drag ends.

games.title: Connect: Monsters
games.description: Connect: Monsters is a fun online puzzle game that enhances your mental skills through monster matching. Compete with friends to achieve high scores on various platforms without needing to download anything, offering enjoyable gameplay whether you're at home or traveling.
games.howToPlayText: The more you connect, the higher your score! As the field fills up, the challenge grows‚Äîplan your moves carefully to avoid running out of space. When the highest-ranked monster connects, it disappears, earning you bonus points. Watch out! If the field gets too crowded, you'll lose. Aim, drop, and connect monsters to outscore your friends and become the ultimate champion!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/connect-monsters?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive
games.description: Experience the excitement of Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive, a dynamic game where you merge items to craft powerful tools and potions. Test your strategy as you navigate dungeons. Play for free online on both mobile and desktop. Embrace your heroic side!
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons.

Merging Items 
In the lower part of the screen, you will find the merging grid. This is where you combine different items to gain various effects:
- Weapons: Merge different weapon parts to create powerful weapons that deal damage to enemies.
- Potions: Combine potions to restore health and boost your survivability.
- Keys: Merge keys to unlock chests scattered throughout the dungeon, which contain valuable loot.
- Coin Pouches: Collect and merge coin pouches to purchase new items from the shop and expand your inventory by buying travel bags from the merchant.

Dungeon Exploration 
In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon. 

Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/monster-slayer-merge--survive?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Nullify - Merge Math
games.description:
Nullify is a minimal abstract relaxing puzzle with the goal of clearing everything from the screen by merging numbers and math symbols.
Improve your logic and math skills by completing unique handcrafted levels and infinite generated levels.

Features:
-56 Levels to complete
-4 Infinite games modes
-Simple and easy controls by dragging elements
-13 math symbols
games.howToPlayText:
Nullify is a minimal abstract relaxing puzzle with the goal of clearing everything from the screen by merging numbers and math symbols.
Improve your logic and math skills by completing unique handcrafted levels and infinite generated levels.
Click and drag to move the symbols and merge them to clear everything from the screen.

games.title: Fun Toy Pals
games.description: Step into a cozy playroom and explore a world full of charming toys! In this addictive merge game, your goal is to combine matching toys on the colorful carpet to create higher-level toys. Unlock achievements as you reach higher scores and compete with players around the world on the global leaderboard. Cute visuals, fun combinations, and endless merging challenges make this game perfect for casual gamers of all ages.
games.howToPlayText:
Combine toys of the same type by dragging them onto each other to create a new, higher-level toy. The more you merge, the higher your score! Complete achievements to unlock special rewards and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate toy master.

Desktop Controls:
Mouse: Click and drag toys to merge them.

Mobile Controls:
Touch: Tap and drag toys to merge them.

games.title: Toytopia
games.description: Toytopia is a cozy merge game where you are tasked to combine and produce art materials which you can use to fix broken toys. Each toy presents a unique challenge and difficulty.
games.howToPlayText: In Toytopia, you simply need to fix the broken parts of a toy by merging art items to produce the required art materials. Use the mouse cursor (desktop) or finger (mobile) to drag and drop items on the board.
